reasoning_steps: Step 1: Screened for transactions announced between 07/01/2025 and 12/31/2025 using public press releases/SEC filings and major newswire sources; filtered to upstream E&P corporate acquisitions or upstream asset sales with disclosed deal value >= $100mm.

Step 2: Verified deal value (USD) and consideration structure (cash/stock/hybrid) directly from primary sources (company press releases, SEC filings) where available; otherwise used reputable public reporting for deal value and inferred payment type only when explicitly described (e.g., all-stock, cash, or cash+equity).

Step 3: Validated each transaction’s timing (announcement date in H2 2025), industry fit (upstream oil & gas producing assets / E&P companies), and size threshold (>= $100mm) before populating exactly 10 rows in the provided M&A Deals template.
